rating_comment: The property is right on the road to Darjeeling, the area is peaceful and the unit is well maintained with ample water and light. Great Host! recommended for Family stay as well.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed with a pet
rating_comment: Its was a nice stay for us. It’s convenient and comfortable. We enjoyed our time here tq
It’s good pet friendly place. It has required amenities and car parking place too. Pratima is responsive host right from check in to check out

I chose this place because it had a kitchen; I dislike restaurants. It is a bit far from the NJP rain station, I had to fight for a 500 rupee taxi. fare It is away from the mad rush and roar of the main roads, clean and equipped. The host's father lives upstairs and was very kind and helpful. There is no air conditioning, only a fan, and it was quite hot. I did dare to open the windows a bit but there are mosquitoes; they had put plug in repellent dispensers and I think that saved me, because I was surprised to see that there were no screens on the windows. I have suggested that important improvement. It was also a long ride back to the shared taxi stand, which was a struggle, although you can get the inner line permit for Sikkim there (bring a photo. Wizride would be better but you would need a credit card valid in India). For a quick overnight it is fine. The father was able to arrange transportation the next day but for sightseeing it would be better to have a car.
Overall a Ok Ok place to stay for 1 Night. Cleanliness should have been a but more.. Specially for the Bathrooms
Comfortable and peaceful stay with all basic amenities required.

This is really Nice place to stay, i stayed for 4 Day and Night. The host Pratima was always just one call away for any sort of help.
It is situated in good area, Darjelling Square is at 5-7 minutes of distance by e-rickshaw, and you can easily get one from this location .
It provides you calm and composed environment.
The Cafe these guys own is just near to the stay was also good.
Would love to visit again and again.
Want you to see grow and flourish, gives an immense pleasure everytime I step in,and an underlined wish to visit more often.

The place very good. Hosts are very friendly and their hospitality is incomparable. They do have a cafe just located just beside the property which is an added advantage. The food is really great. I love the mac and cheese. It was a very peaceful and comfortable stay. I would recommend the homestay for others and also I would love to stay here again.
Great place. Very good host and cozy rooms at affordable price. 5star

Serene Ambience.
Pleasant Stay.
Very Co-operative & Friendly Host and Team(Family).
Would Book over and again.
Great food 😋 , loved the mushroom pasta & steak ! . great hosts!

The homestay here was good. The place was clean and the rooms and all were good. The hosts Pratima and Raghav were very friendly and helpful. The cafe next to the homestay that they run has incredible continental food. Probably the best I have ever had in North Bengal. Their dishes reminded me of food that I would eat back home in America. So for foreigners living away from home for a long time that was special for us. Also Pratima let our children do Karaoke and play board games in the cafe. They had so much fun. It was a such a great time.
A great homely place to stay, right on the highway to Darjeeling, Gangtok, Nepal. Loved Pratima's hospitality.
clean and peaceful place to stay, kind and polite hosts
Awesome place to stay , and you have a cafe nearby with awesome food.
It's a comfortable place to stay overnight, located in middle of city , so have to navigate city traffic.
Superb hospitality and amazing host..cafe in property is extra add on .value for money .must better than expectations
awesome host 🙌☺️❤️

Pratima is an outstanding host. Not only did she ensure that every thing was above expectations, she went up and above to accomodate our last minute requests. The property itself is in a good location with plenty of parking. The rooms were well appointed and clean, with plenty of outside space for a walk. I would highly recommend Miltoniabliss to anyone.
